link.title: SAU 20 COVID-19 Updates

");}).call(this);

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: “Tough times never last, but tough people do.”

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: – Robert H Schuller

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: ECS Meals Application

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

iframe.aria-label: YouTube Video, What This Chart Actually Means for COVID-19

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lora;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lora;
span.strong: Remote Learning Extended Until the End of School Year

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: As we begin week 5 of Remote Learning we have started to develop some routines and I continue to be amazed and the resilience of our community of learners.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: I am comforted knowing that as of last week we are now able to deliver a breakfast and lunch to every child between the ages of 2 and 18 in the Androscoggin Valley. If you would like to receive meals please click on the tabs above this post, once you fill out the form or email you will get confirmation from the school within 48 hours and food will be delivered.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: By the end of the week we will have direction from the Governor regarding when we will be able to return to school. As soon as we know more I will send out a message.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: I have been thinking every day about our graduating seniors. There accomplishments should be recognized and we are committed to making sure we do all we can to support them through this. If you know a senior please reach out and congratulate them.

div.p: These have been trying times for everyone. If you or someone you know needs help please reach out.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dear Edward Fenn, GMHS, ECS and MVS Staff, Families & Students,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: There have been many questions brought forward regarding the upcoming school vacation scheduled for April 20-24. This is a hot topic across the state right now with the date fast approaching. It is rare for changes in the school calendar to occur once the year has begun but as we all know, these are strange times! There were many factors taken into consideration for the following adjustments but I feel strongly that the changes are a compromise that will meet the needs of all:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic;
span.strong: ECS will continue with the original schedule in order to stay aligned with Colebrook.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Monday April 20 & Tuesday April 21

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will remain vacation days, giving us

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: all

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: a necessary break from learning for a 4-day stretch.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Remote Learning will start back up on

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Wednesday April 22.

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We will have

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: great flexibility

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: with all staff and families who feel they need the full week’s break so feel free to reach out for accommodations as needed.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The 3 vacation days gained with these changes will be available for use later in the school year as we maneuver through this COVID-19 situation. Should we be allowed by the Governor to return to school when the situation is re-evaluated on May 4th, we could choose to use the 3 vacation days before returning to the building or in combination with the Memorial Day 3-day weekend. Should we be prohibited from returning to school for the remainder of the scheduled school year, we can use the 3 vacation days to finish school early, hopefully at a time when social isolation is over and we can all resume travel. Again, flexibility is the key!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Meals will still be delivered as scheduled each day April 20-24, as we did receive a waiver from the USDA allowing us to serve on non-school days.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: During the last few weeks we have seen amazing support from all and it has truly inspired me. I am so proud of the effort from everyone involved in this and want to thank you all for what you do to ensure the education of every student every day. This event has proven what I think we all already knew about our community, we are strong and we are stronger together.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: David Backler

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Thank you to those that filled out a survey form to help us determine areas of adjustment in our Remote Learning process. As you know, this is a new venture for all of us and with that, it's important to constantly monitor and make changes where needed in order to provide what's best for all parties, especially since we are now in this mode until at least May 4th. In our few weeks, we have been overwhelmed with the great support and involvement of our families! Thank you so much for all you have been doing to help us deliver education, albeit, in a very different way. This has not been an easy undertaking for any of us, especially given the seriousness of the pandemic, social isolation, unemployment for some of you and the fear it is bringing to all.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: As we work toward a model of mastery and true competency we are making adjustments to our day to better meet the needs of all our stakeholders. There are many components that make up the education of a student and direct instruction is only a portion of that. Remember that a typical day at school includes a significant amount of time for students to learn socially (recess, longer lunches, break/snack/flex/advisory times, group work...). The younger the child, the more time for social learning. The guidelines for school work time that teachers will be using are as follows:

span.style: font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Grades K-1: 45 minutes

span.style: font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Grades 2-3: 60 minutes

span.style: font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Grades 4-5: 90 minutes

div.p: Grades 6-8: 30 minutes per teacher (2 hours max in a day)
Grades 9-12: 30 minutes per teacher (3 hours max in a day(AP and RS may vary))

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We know that students take different amounts of time to complete school work and it may take longer for some than what we are projecting. That said we also know that some students will want more opportunities for learning and so we are encouraging our educators to provide enrichment opportunities that will challenge students who have completed the required assignments.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Each school will be looking at different ways that they can create a thoughtful and engaging schedule that will include more time for making up work as well as projects for deeper dives into learning. Please keep an eye out for that message from your students' school.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We thank you for your patience as we move along this uncharted pathway. We miss the students terribly and I know they miss the routine of school (as I'm sure you do as well). As always, if you have questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to teachers, building principals or myself.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: David Backler, Superintendent

p.style: text-align: left;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Remote learning will be extended to May 4.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Gov. Chris Sununu is also telling all Granite Staters to stay home and ordering nonessential businesses to close in an effort to slow the spread of COVID-19.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The stay-at-home order will take effect Friday night at 11:59 p.m., Sununu said. Nonessential businesses must close by the end of Friday, he said.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sununu noted that this is not an order to in place, something he said he does not have the authority to do. He said no one's prevented from leaving their homes, transportation isn't shutting down, and the state's borders are not closed. All state beaches on the Seacoast will also be closed effective Friday night.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: "No governor can shut down their border," Sununu said.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The governor said the order will be in effect until May 4.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: "The worst may still be ahead of us," Sununu said. "It will take sacrifice, but New Hampshire is resilient, and we will get through it."

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: He said the moves will align New Hampshire with other states in the region that have issued similar orders.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Information from WMUR

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: 3/23/20 Start of Our First Full Week

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: As we begin our first full week of remote learning we wanted to share a video that explains the COVID-19 situation in a way that we feel is clear and concise. We hope you all are doing alright and please don't hesitate to reach out with any questions or concerns.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: As we continue to monitor the evolving COVID-19 emergency, it has become clear we need to fully implement precautions and measures to assure the health and safety of our community. With that continued commitment, coupled with our continued dedication to the mission of accessible high-quality education, we have now started remote learning in all of our schools.

By now you should have been contacted directly by your school, picked up your child's supplies, computer and connected online with your teacher/s. If at this time you have not been in contact with your school it is imperative that you reach out to them today. We are committed to continuing to educate all of our students but we will need your help to make this possible.
Please check your school's website for specific updates
Every school has developed plans that will allow for direct contact between families, teachers and staff, if you don't know how you are being contacted please reach out to your school.
We have started delivering breakfast and lunch to students who qualify, if you aren't currently receiving food and believe that you qualify please contact your school.
As situations continue to change our schools plan to be resources to our communities.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: We will be sending out forms for free and reduced lunch knowing that families may be facing new economic challenges and the delivery of meals may be beneficial.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: We know that some of our student will face anxiety and stress and our School Counselors will be available to address these situations (see your school's website for details).

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: While you are home with your family you may have a medical question so our school nurses will be on-call to address your concerns.

div.p: If you only take one thing from this message know that we are in this together. We are a strong community and we will get through this.

p.style: margin-left: 15px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: “Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work through difficult problems.”

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic;
font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: ― Gever Tulley

div.p: David Backler, Superintendent

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: 3/17/20 Plans are Starting to Come Together

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: I was able to visit every school yesterday and was inspired by what I saw. Every staff person has been hard at work developing plans for students ensuring they continue to receive a world-class education. Each school has either sent out information to students and families or will today explaining the specifics of how remote learning will work in each school. In addition, a representative will be reaching out to make direct contact with every student today to check in and make sure they have access to what they need to start. If you haven’t been contacted by the end of the day please call your student’s school tomorrow and they will assist you.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: At 1:00 pm today Governor Sununu

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic;
span.strong: announced

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: the immediate closing of schools starting tomorrow and continuing through April 3

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic;
span.strong: due to concerns regarding COVID-19.

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Since the Governor’s message and all throughout this situation I have been receiving an outpouring of support and offers to help. It has made me realize that there is a silver lining to this event.

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Tough times have the potential to bring communities together and I know that we will.

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: There will be many questions we face over the coming weeks and I am committed to ensuring that we have good answers to them all. That said we will all have to be flexible and support each other as we navigate this situation. We will be updating information on this page frequently so please check back for up to the minute changes.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This is what we know so far:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The Governor has ordered all schools closed from 3/16/20 until 4/3/20 and they will reassess after that.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Over the next week staff at each school will work together to develop plans that will best meet the needs of each age and population in their buildings.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Over the next week, remote learning will begin to ramp up with full implementation by Monday, March 23. Details will be coming home over the next few days.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We know that many families rely on the meals that their schools provide and information will be sent out soon regarding how your school will continue to provide breakfast and lunch remotely.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Some students have different learning needs and staff will be reaching out to those families in the next few days to share modified learning plans.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions and thank you all for your support in this difficult situation.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: David Backler, Superintendent

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: “Tough times never last, but tough people do.”

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: – Robert H Schuller

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Dear Community,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are writing to provide you an update about the 2019 Coronavirus (COVID-19). As I am sure you are all aware this process has been changing hourly and we are doing everything we can to keep you up to date. We are currently working with local, regional and statewide agencies to ensure we have the most current information and are following their recommendations. Please reference your school’s website for up to the minute changes and information. We will provide SAU specific information, for information on the ongoing COVID-19 issue please go directly to the

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: or

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: website.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Recent changes:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: All school-sponsored sporting events have been postponed

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: All out of area field trips have been postponed

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: All large gatherings have been postponed

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Check your school’s web calendar for details and current information

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Future Planning:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are actively working with all of our local and regional agencies to make sure we are up to date and doing what is best for our students, staff and, community. We are balancing the many negative impacts that closing schools would have on everyone with the potential mitigation that closing schools for a time would create. Our decisions will be based on what is best for our communities using the support of our local agencies, NH DHHS, NH DOE, and the CDC. That said we are working on plans that will address the needs of all our stakeholders as we navigate this tortuous path.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are actively working on contingency plans

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Remote and online lessons are being developed

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Policies are being addressed so that we can be more responsive to the needs of our students, staff, and community.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are working on a way for students to pick up food if we have to close for a period of time

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: You can expect that most events will be postponed or canceled while we deal with this current issue.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: David Backler, Superintendent

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: I wanted to send out an update from the CDC regarding anyone who has recently returned or will return from travel abroad. Please take a look at the information below and feel free to contact your school or the SAU if you have any questions.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: David Backler, Superintendent

span.style: font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As of March 4, 2020 The United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has announced asymptomatic travelers from countries with a Level 3 travel advisory are to be advised to stay home and monitor their health for 14 days after returning to the United States. Travelers from countries with a Level 2 travel advisory are to be advised to monitor their health and limit interactions at large gatherings with others for 14 days after returning to the United States. For residential schools, this period of quarantine should be in a private room with private bath, and ideally a direct exit (rather than exit through common areas).

span.style: font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Household members such as family members, including children, of quarantined individuals are not required to quarantine. As long as they remain asymptomatic, they can leave the home and can go to public places like school and work. If the person being quarantined develops illness, household members must then also stay home on quarantine.

p.style: margin-left: -29px; margin-right: -29px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Dear Community,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are writing to provide you an update about the 2019 Coronavirus (COVID-19). It is important for all of us to make sure we are taking precautions to help prevent the spread of COVID-19 and other respiratory illnesses, such as the flu, which we frequently see this time of year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: COVID-19 and many other common respiratory viruses spread through contact with an infected person’s respiratory droplets, such as when a person coughs or sneezes. To prevent the spread of respiratory viruses, the CDC recommends that individuals engage in everyday preventive measures to help stop the spread of germs and avoid illness, such as:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Wash hands frequently with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use alcohol-based hand sanitizers.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Avoid touching eyes, mouth and nose with unwashed hands.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Do not share personal items such as water bottles.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Avoid close contact with individuals who are sick.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Stay home when you are sick. The CDC recommends that individuals remain home for at least 24 hours after you no longer have a fever or signs of a fever (i.e., chills, feeling warm, flushed appearance).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then immediately discard the tissue in the trash.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: In addition to these personal prevention measures, school, college and university community members should avoid all travel to any locations for which CDC has issued a Level 3 travel notice. See CDC travel notice website:

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: . Travel to other countries outside of the U.S. should be discussed with an individual’s healthcare provider.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: According to the health department, people who have returned from mainland China are being monitored by public health authorities and must stay home for 14 days after their travel. People who have returned from other locations with travel notices for COVID-19 may continue to attend work and school. If you develop symptoms (e.g. fever, cough, or shortness of breath), you should:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Take your temperature with a thermometer.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Stay home and avoid close contact with other people.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Seek health advice by phone from either a healthcare provider or the NH Division of Public Health Services at 603-271-4496 (after-hours 603-271-5300).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Before going to a doctor’s office or emergency room, call ahead and tell the provider or office about recent travel and symptoms.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • Practice strict respiratory etiquette and hand hygiene including covering the nose and mouth with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and washing hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, or using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer if soap and water are not available.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • If available, wear a surgical mask when traveling outside of the home (e.g. to a doctor’s office)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Outbreaks involving COVID-19 evolve quickly and recommendations from public health officials may change as new information becomes available. Please check the following websites often for updated information:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • U.S. CDC website:

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: • NH Division of Public Health Services website:

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Gentium Basic; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: David Backler, Superintendent
